name: The New Oasis
description:
The New Oasis :

The New Oasis is a third-person platform game, where your simple goal is to get to the end of the trail in front of you. Nothing's easier.

You play as Jack, a sweet little cactus who just needs a vacation in his oasis. But, before his vacation, a terrible and perilous path awaits him !

This project has been realised during studies at the Gaming Campus.

Project realised with Unreal in Blueprints.

Group members : Matthias Heughebaert / David Nguyen / Léo Chabert
